description: Set of VCLs required to integrate Datadome services. Please note for full functionality Fastly support needs to enable proper handling of POST requests. Do not enable unless this has been done.
name: DataDome Bot Detection integration

properties.label: Exclusion regex
properties.name: datadome_exclusion_ext
properties.description: The regex that will be applied to req.url.path

properties.label: Connection timeout
properties.name: datadome_connect_timeout
properties.description: How long to wait for a timeout in milliseconds.

properties.label: First byte timeout
properties.name: datadome_first_byte_timeout
properties.description: How long to wait for the first byte in milliseconds.

properties.label: Between bytes timeout
properties.name: datadome_between_bytes_timeout
properties.description: How long to wait between bytes in milliseconds.

properties.label: Logging Endpoint for Debugging (Optional)
properties.name: logging_endpoint
properties.description: Name of a logging endpoint that has been already set up in Fastly.
